Token.Abstract: The RKMappingResult class represents the aggregate object mapping results returned by an RKMapperOperation object. The mapping result provides a thin interface on top of an NSDictionary and provides convenient interfaces for accessing the mapping results in various representations.
Initializes the receiver with a dictionary of mapped key paths and object values.

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary wherein the keys represent mapped key paths and the values represent the objects mapped at those key paths. Cannot be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver, initialized with the given dictionary.

Token.Abstract: Returns a representation of the mapping result as a dictionary.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A dictionary containing the mapping results.

Token.Abstract: Returns a representation of the mapping result as a single object by returning the first mapped value from the aggregate array of mapped objects.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The first object contained in the mapping result.

Token.Abstract: Returns a representation of the mapping result as an array of objects.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing the objects contained in the mapping result.

Token.Abstract: Returns a representation of the mapping result as a set of objects.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A set containing the objects contained in the mapping result.

Token.Abstract: Returns a count of the number of objects contained in the mapping result. This is an aggregate count of all objects across all mapped key paths in the result.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A count of the number of mapped objects in the mapping result.
